section.title: Grid Styles
section.para: Available drawing styles for surface/grid data:

row.entry: All data points are drawn as simple dots at their coordinate positions (the cutoff value is ignored)
Data points above the cutoff are drawn as simple dots at their coordinate positions
A triangulated wireframe isosurface is drawn between points above the cutoff value
A trangulated solid isosurface is drawn between points above the cutoff value
